name: Battleaxe Fantasy
description:
-- This is an unfinished prototype for a turn based strategy game --

Prototype of a turn based fantasy wargame. Set up your army and battle the computer.

Controls

  • Camera: WASD to pan the camera, Q/E to zoom
  • Left click: Select/Deselect
  • Right click: Execute action

Basic Gameplay

  • Put together an army, not exceeding the total point limit
  • Place the army on the battlefield. The players alternate in placing one unit.
  • After all units are placed, the battle starts.
  • The players alternate in moving one of their units.
    • After a unit has been moved, it can't be moved again until all other units have also been moved.
    • If the unit is grey, it has already been moved this round.
